abstract: Procter & Gamble, the consumer goods giant, is part of a wave of companies getting into the music business to promote their own products.
snippet: Procter & Gamble, the consumer goods giant, is part of a wave of companies getting into the music business to promote their own products.
lead_paragraph: The hip-hop and R&B producer Jermaine Dupri has discovered best-selling acts like Kris Kross and Da Brat, has produced hits for Mariah Carey and Jay-Z, and now runs the urban music division of the Island Def Jam Music Group. He’s also looking for fresh talent for a new label financed by a company new to the music industry.

headline.main: It’s American Brandstand: Marketers Underwrite Performers
headline.print_headline: It’s American Brandstand: Marketers Underwrite Performers
